data.title: Aralaguppe, Tiptur, Tumakuru, Karnataka, India

data.text:
Climate Change, Weather and Environment Reports / Data for Aralaguppe

Climate, Environment and Weather data, climate change reports etc. for Aralaguppe is available as professional paid service. You may contact us for further details and sample data.

A brief summary of available data for Aralaguppe is given below:

CategoryResolutionPeriodPrecipitation - hHalf Hourly / 0.1 deg (11 kms) grid2001 - 2024Precipitation - lDaily / 0.25 deg (28 kms) grid1901 - 2024Temperature - hMonthly / 0.5 deg (55 kms) grid1901 - 2023Temperature - lDaily / 1 deg (111 kms) grid1951 - 2024

Social Structure of Aralaguppe

As per available data from the year 2009, 2247 persons live in 595 house holds in the village Aralaguppe. There are 1149 female individuals and 1098 male individuals in the village. Females constitute 51.13% and males constitute 48.87% of the total population.

There are 318 scheduled castes persons of which 173 are females and 145 are males. Females constitute 54.4% and males constitute 45.6% of the scheduled castes population. Scheduled castes constitute 14.15% of the total population.

There are 135 scheduled tribes persons of which 68 are females and 67 are males. Females constitute 50.37% and males constitute 49.63% of the scheduled tribes population. Scheduled tribes constitute 6.01% of the total population.

Population density of Aralaguppe is 201.41 persons per square kilometer.

Land and Natural Resources in Aralaguppe

Maps, reports and datasets of Aralaguppe on topography, land use land cover(LULC), watershed / hydrological parameters etc. are available as a professional paid service. Please contact us for further details.

Total area of Aralaguppe is 1115.64 Hectares as per the data available for the year 2009.

Total sown/agricultural area is 953.29 ha. About 637.27 ha is un-irrigated area. About 316.02 ha is irrigated area. About 316.02 ha is irrigated by tanks/lakes.

About 66.14 ha is in non-agricultural use. About 5.63 ha is used permanent pastures and grazing lands. About 2.86 ha is under miscellaneous tree crops.

About 40.79 ha is lying as current fallow area. About 3.4 ha is culturable waste land. About 17.98 ha is lying as fallow land other than current fallows. About 25.55 ha is covered by barren and un-cultivable land.

Schools in Aralaguppe

There is a government pre-primary school. Additionally, there is a private pre-primary school in the village Aralaguppe.

There are 2 government primary schools in the village Aralaguppe.

There is a government middle school in the village Aralaguppe.

There is a government secondary school in the village Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government senior secondary schools in the village. However, there is a private senior secondary school in Biligere, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

Colleges in Aralaguppe

There are no private or government arts and science degree colleges in the village. However, there is a private arts and science degree college in Tiptur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government engineering colleges in the village. However, there is a government engineering college in Tiptur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government medical colleges in the village. However, there is a government medical college in Tumkur, which is more than 10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no management institutes in the village Aralaguppe or anywhere in the nearby villages.

There are no private or government polytechnic institutes in the village. However, there is a private polytechnic institute in Tiptur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

Other Educational Facilities in Aralaguppe

There are no private or government vocational training school / ITIs in the village. However, there is a private vocational training school / ITI in Tiptur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government non formal training centres in the village. However, there is a private non formal training centre in Tiptur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government differently abled schools in the village. However, there is a private differently abled school in Tiptur, which is more than 10 kms away from Aralaguppe.
